title: EF Education-EasyPost Partners U23 Team Aevolo in Hunt for Tour de France Talent
content:
New York-based devo team to feed WorldTour squad with future stars: 'If you have the desire to win the Tour de France, you need to identify and nurture talent, and build a team around it.'

Read the full article at EF Education-EasyPost Partners U23 Team Aevolo in Hunt for Tour de France Talent on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
